case.state: I am Weiss Schnee. I wanted to work on my tan but Ruby suggested we play cards instead. So could someone tell me what we are playing?
It's a pleasure to meet you! My name is Geist Schnee. Er, Weiss. Weiss Schnee.
It's a pleasure to meet you! My name is Geist Schnee. Er, Weiss Schnee. Slip of the tongue.
Hello, I am the spectral form of Weiss Schnee of the Schnee Dust Company. It's a pleasure to make your phantasmagoric acquaintance.
Excuse me, but has anyone seen my teammate, Ruby Rose? She told me this was the perfect place to get a tan. But now I can't find her anywhere...
I am Weiss Schnee. It's a pleasure to meet you. Though I am only here, because my teamleader, Ruby Rose dragged me. Could someone tell me what we are playing?
Excuse me, but has anyone seen my teammate, Ruby Rose? She dragged me here to play cards, but now I can't find her anywhere...
Did Ruby drag your here too Blake?
Pyrrha! You're here too? This game might not be so bad after all.
Who is this white-haired girl?... She looks just like... Me!
Who is she? Could somebody please explain to me who this other Weiss is?
Winter your here? N... Not that I mind.
Yang? I can't say I'm surprised to see that you're here.
They allow kids in here too?
Is that?... Sorry I mistook you from one of my old maids for a second.
It seems I'm not the only heiress here tonight.
Okay, Ruby. Now that I'm here. What are we playing?
Oh no not her.
Are you a Pirate? Normally I would never associate with criminals but I'll make an exception this once.
What? How did that car even get here?
Oh great the waitress is here. I could use a ice cold drink.
You almost look as impressive as my sister Winter.
That girl almost looks as impressive as you Winter.
Looks like the entire team is here. But where are you guy's swimsuits?
Good to see someone with a fine sense of fashion here.
Five other guys? What excatly has Ruby set me up for?
I guess this is sisters against sister.
Ruby did you drag Blake down here too?
Oh, Yang is here too? You guys aren't planning on pulling some kind of prank on me, right?
Yang and Blake are here too? I'm glad my teammates are here but where did Ruby go?
Winter! Um... This is my teammate Blake.
Winter! Um... This is my teamleader Ruby.
Winter! Um... This is my teammate Yang.
Yang are you going to be okay. Playing with her?
Okay, Ruby. You convinced me to go to the beach, what are we going to do?
Costume. I assure you this isn't a costume miss.
Ruby Rose, did you seriously bring me here to play a simple card game?
Seems like we are playing poker. Let's try and win this Blake.
Alright Yang. It will be my pleasure to beat you in poker.
(I really need to bring my A game now that Winter is here.)
Excellent. I should be able to impress Pyrrha with my amazing poker skills.
Don't think for a second that I will allow you to beat me Neo.
I feel like there's some sort of strange vibe from you, Jolyne.
Today makes the anniversary for the day I fought Arma Gigas. Feels like so long ago now.
Did that butterfly just talk? This must be similar to Qrow's magic?
Ruby told me this was my birthday gift to me... But this seems like an odd gift.
We all float down here...
Do you like my swimsuit? Atlas is almost always cold, so I rarely have a chance to wear it.
So it's the four of us playing. And... ~player~? Do any of you know her?
Who invited the guy? Isn't this supposed to be a Team RWBY game?
You can stay for now, ~player~. But I'm watching you. Don't do anything weird.
Wait, the press is here? I was under the impression that this would be a private game.
It appears as though I'm in respectable company. How nice.
I don't feel very safe for some reason.
Are you witches? I know magic is real. But I never thought...
A Team RWBY match. Let's see who among us is the best at cards.
Alright an all girl game... Has any of you seen my teammates?
Me against 4 boys? Whatever I am still going to win.
Fortunately, I am rather skilled at card games... But still, I can't help but worry. You would not believe the sort of trouble that Ruby can get up to unsupervised.
Poker? Well, I suppose I can play one game with you... Still, I do need to find Ruby soon. You would not believe the sort of trouble that girl gets herself into.
Are we playing poker? Unfortunately for you, the Schnee family has a reputation for being rather skilled at card games.
~cards~ will suffice.
~cards~ new cards. Please.
I need these ~cards~ cards exchanged.
~cards~ new cards would surely improve my hand.
Hmmm. I guess I should replace these ~cards~ cards.
This is fine. All I need is ~cards~ new cards.
These ~cards~ cards need to be replaced.
Winter would probably replace these ~cards~.
I just need to exchange these ~cards~ cards and my hand will be perfect.
Let's see... these ~cards~ cards, should probably be exchanged.
~cards~ spooky cards, please.
~cards~ cards, please -- and make them extra spooky.
~cards~ will suffice.
~cards~ new cards. Please.
I need these ~cards~ cards exchanged.
~cards~ new cards would surely improve my hand.
Hmmm. I guess I should replace these ~cards~ cards.
This is fine. All I need is ~cards~ new cards.
These ~cards~ cards need to be replaced.
Winter would probably replace these ~cards~.
I just need to exchange these ~cards~ cards and my hand will be perfect.

Give me ~cards~ new cards so we can finish the game.

This should be an easy victory.

Soon you will all remember the name Schnee.

Victory is assured.
I've practically won already.
I have already won.
There's no way for me to lose now.
Fit for a princess! Or heiress, even.
I hope you didn't expect to win.
If you want me to undress more, I am going to have to disappoint you.

Safe for now! Haha!
You won't see me losing this hand!
You guys are not beating me this round.
I doubt you can beat me with this hand.
I'm safe for now.
You won't defeat me.
I might just win after all.
I won't be the one to lose this time!
A hand deserving of a princess.
Marvelous. I am sure to win this round.
A hand deserving of an heiress.
I'll be the victor this time.
Alright. I should be able to turn things around with this.

Things are finally going my way.
Thank you. I really needed a good hand.
Thank you. I will be safe for this round.
I really needed a hand like this.
I feel like this is enough to save me.
At least this hand seems good.
I am going to win this. I have to.
I'll be safe for this round.

This is not ideal. But I will still win.

It's okay... I can still win this round.
Stay calm, Weiss. You've had worse hands in this game.

I am still going to win this round.

Are you serious? I am a Schnee, you can't do this to me.

Yes! Fear the almighty power of my cards! Cower as they pillage your homes and weep as they take your children from your very arms!
I should be able to win with this.

Do I get to put my brooch on again if I win?
Do I get to my belts back if I win?
Ruby, you didn't tell me that there would be cute boys here.
Ruby, you didn't tell me that there would be cute boys here.
So many cute boys here tonight.

Sorry for getting angry at you Twilight. But I wasn't aware this would be a stripping game.
Oh please. Your wealth is nothing compared to the Schnee Dust Company
I-I didn't mean t-to flirt with you Mulan. I am not into girls.

It's the family name. I don't run the company (yet).
A pleasure to meet you, Mei. I hope the dust is living up to your satisfaction.

Tch. Clearly there's no dress code for this game.
Alright Ruby, I will play a couple of rounds.

I didn't know there would be cute boys here.

B-but I don't have anything on under this!

B-but I'll be naked...
Y-you'll see my...

S-so, let me start by saying that I had an October wedding...
S-so, before I take my dress off, I should explain that I had an October wedding...

No Yang I don't want to go to a topless beach. And I certainly don't want to go to a nudist beach. Not now, not ever.

Sounds like someone's getting jealous.
